title: 4-1 vote on plan near AHS shows challenges board faces as it follows its authority
content: YourArlington took a close look at the meaning behind the 4-1 vote on July 20 to approve one controversial project, in the block across from Arlington High School.

title: The New Normal and the Arlington Redevelopment Board: When Zoning Bylaws become Optional
content: ARFRR details serious issues with ARB's meeting on 882 Mass Ave / Toraya block redevelopment.

title: Altered Mass. Ave. block proposal to return July 20
content: The developers of the business block across from Arlington High School came back with a fresh plan, but it drew a new series of questions, and they expected to return with responses July 20.

title: They're Baaaack... - Hotel Lexington (VII) and the Toraya Block Tear Down
content: ARFRR provides a detailed look and criticism of developer's detailed plans for both proposals.

title: Redevelopment Board continued hearing on Docket # 3625 for 882-892 Massachusetts Avenue
content: Agenda of Redevelopment Board meeting on Docket # 3625 (Proposed condos/apartments in Toraya/Thana Thai block) with significantly updated plans.

title: Mass. Ave., hotel developers told to come back in July
content: Those questioning development were out in force virtually at the Monday, May 18, as Redevelopment Board members listened and weighed in with their own sharp views.   Two votes summed up those opinions: Return to the board in July with clearer focuses.

title: Redevelopment Board meeting on Docket # 3625 for 882-892 Massachusetts Avenue
content: Agenda of Redevelopment Board meeting on Docket # 3625 (Proposed condos/apartments in Toraya/Thana Thai block})

title: Toraya closes as 22-apartment project planned for block
content: A two-decade favorite for sushi has closed because it lost its lease, though it hopes to reopen in another space, Boston Restaurant Talk reports.

title: Toraya Restaurant in Arlington Loses Lease, Closes; Hopes to Open in New Location
content: According to several sources, including a tweet from @mrboboto, Toraya Restaurant in Arlington has shuttered, with the website for the Mass. Ave dining spot saying that 'Our landlord has let us know that they are planning to demolish the building'...
